Title: Enough Garlic
Description:
Normally, this would do. I'm not so picky. But you're a guest. So we'll need some garlic.

I found some growing on a hill not far off. Shouldn't be there. But it is.

Too bad hydras found it, too.

You have weapons and such, right?
RewardText: Ahh, there we go. That is enough garlic.
